posts.title: TW-COVID-Bot (Telegram Bot)
posts.preview: During the COVID-19 pandemic in Taiwan, I assisted social media influencers in automatically posting daily outbreak information for easy access to up-to-date information.

posts.title: iOS Development
posts.preview: During the summer vacation of my second year of University, I participated in the summer iOS development practical training, cultivating skills in mobile development through hands-on experience with UI components and design patterns in the Intelligent Mobile Application Club (I.M.A.C) laboratory on campus.
